verses.verse: And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Shechem <S%H7927><s%> to his mother's <S%H517><s%> brothers, <S%H251><s%> and communed <S%H1696><s%> with them, and with all <S%H3605><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of his mother's <S%H517><s%> father, <S%H1><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak, <S%H1696><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> Whether <S%H4100><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> for you, either that all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> which are three score <S%H7657><s%> and ten persons, <S%H376><s%> reign <S%H4910><s%> over you, or that one <S%H259><s%> reign <S%H4910><s%> over you? remember <S%H2142><s%> also that I am your bone <S%H6106><s%> and your flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

And his mother's <S%H517><s%> brothers <S%H251><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> of him in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words: <S%H1697><s%> and their hearts <S%H3820><s%> inclined <S%H5186><s%> to follow <S%H935><s%> <S%H310><s%> Abimelech; <S%H40><s%> for they said, <S%H559><s%> He is our brother. <S%H251><s%>

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> him three score <S%H7657><s%> and ten pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Baalberith, <S%H1170><s%> with which Abimelech <S%H40><s%> hired <S%H7936><s%> vain <S%H7386><s%> and light <S%H6348><s%> persons, <S%H582><s%> which followed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

And he went <S%H935><s%> to his father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> at Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> being three score <S%H7657><s%> and ten persons, <S%H376><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> stone: <S%H68><s%> notwithstanding yet Jotham <S%H3147><s%> the youngest <S%H3996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> was left; <S%H3498><s%> for he hid <S%H2244><s%> himself.

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> together, and all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo, <S%H4407><s%> and went, <S%H3212><s%> and made Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king, <S%H4428><s%> by the plain <S%H436><s%> of the pillar <S%H5324><s%> that was in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

And when they told <S%H5046><s%> it to Jotham, <S%H3147><s%> he went <S%H3212><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the top <S%H7218><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim, <S%H1630><s%> and lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and cried, <S%H7121><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, Listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, you men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> may listen <S%H8085><s%> to you.

The trees <S%H6086><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> forth on a time to anoint <S%H4886><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them; and they said <S%H559><s%> to the olive <S%H2132><s%> tree, Reign <S%H4427><s%> you over <S%H5921><s%> us.

But the olive <S%H2132><s%> tree said <S%H559><s%> to them, Should I leave <S%H2308><s%> my fatness, <S%H1880><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> by me they honor <S%H3513><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and man, <S%H376><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to be promoted <S%H5128><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the trees? <S%H6086><s%>
And the trees <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the fig <S%H8384><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> Come <S%H3212><s%> you, and reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us.

But the fig <S%H8384><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Should I forsake <S%H2308><s%> my sweetness, <S%H4987><s%> and my good <S%H2896><s%> fruit, <S%H8570><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to be promoted <S%H5128><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the trees? <S%H6086><s%>
Then said <S%H559><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> to the vine, <S%H1612><s%> Come <S%H3212><s%> you, and reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us.

And the vine <S%H1612><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Should I leave <S%H2308><s%> my wine, <S%H8492><s%> which cheers <S%H8055><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and man, <S%H376><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to be promoted <S%H5128><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the trees? <S%H6086><s%>
Then said <S%H559><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> to the bramble, <S%H329><s%> Come <S%H3212><s%> you, and reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us.

And the bramble <S%H329><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the trees, <S%H6086><s%> If <S%H518><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> you anoint <S%H4886><s%> me king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, then come <S%H935><s%> and put your trust <S%H2620><s%> in my shadow: <S%H6738><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> not, let fire <S%H784><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> out of the bramble, <S%H329><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, if <S%H518><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> truly <S%H571><s%> and sincerely, <S%H8549><s%> in that you have made Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king, <S%H4427><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you have dealt <S%H6213><s%> well <S%H2895><s%> with Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> and his house, <S%H1004><s%> and have done <S%H6213><s%> to him according to the deserving <S%H1576><s%> of his hands; <S%H3027><s%>

(For my father <S%H1><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for you, and adventured <S%H7993><s%> his life <S%H5315><s%> far, <S%H5048><s%> and delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian: <S%H4080><s%>

And you are risen <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> my father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> and have slain <S%H2026><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> three score <S%H7657><s%> and ten persons, <S%H376><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> and have made Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of his maidservant, <S%H519><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he is your brother; <S%H251><s%>)

If <S%H518><s%> you then have dealt <S%H6213><s%> truly <S%H571><s%> and sincerely <S%H8549><s%> with Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> and with his house <S%H1004><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> then rejoice <S%H8055><s%> you in Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and let him also <S%H1571><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in you:

But if <S%H518><s%> not, let fire <S%H784><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> out from Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo; <S%H4407><s%> and let fire <S%H784><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> out from the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo, <S%H4407><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Jotham <S%H3147><s%> ran <S%H5127><s%> away, and fled, <S%H1272><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to Beer, <S%H876><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> for fear <S%H6440><s%> of Abimelech <S%H40><s%> his brother. <S%H251><s%>
When Abimelech <S%H40><s%> had reigned <S%H7786><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> with Abimelech: <S%H40><s%>

That the cruelty <S%H2555><s%> done to the three score <S%H7657><s%> and ten sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> might come, <S%H935><s%> and their blood <S%H1818><s%> be laid <S%H7760><s%> on Abimelech <S%H40><s%> their brother, <S%H251><s%> which <S%H834><s%> slew <S%H2026><s%> them; and on the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> which <S%H834><s%> aided <S%H2388><s%> <S%H3027><s%> him in the killing <S%H2026><s%> of his brothers. <S%H251><s%>

And the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> liers in wait <S%H693><s%> for him in the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and they robbed <S%H1497><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that came <S%H5674><s%> along that way <S%H1870><s%> by them: and it was told <S%H5046><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and went <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to Shechem: <S%H7927><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> put their confidence <S%H982><s%> in him.

And they went <S%H3318><s%> out into the fields, <S%H7704><s%> and gathered <S%H1219><s%> their vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and stepped <S%H1869><s%> the grapes, and made <S%H6213><s%> merry, <S%H1974><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of their god, <S%H430><s%> and did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink, <S%H8354><s%> and cursed <S%H7043><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> is Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> that we should serve <S%H5647><s%> him? is not he the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal? <S%H3378><s%> and Zebul <S%H2083><s%> his officer? <S%H6496><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Shechem: <S%H7927><s%> for why <S%H4100><s%> should we serve <S%H5647><s%> him?

And would <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> to God this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> were under my hand! <S%H3027><s%> then would I remove <S%H5493><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%> And he said <S%H559><s%> to Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> Increase <S%H7235><s%> your army, <S%H6635><s%> and come <S%H3318><s%> out.

And when Zebul <S%H2083><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed, <S%H5651><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled. <S%H2734><s%>

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Abimelech <S%H40><s%> privately, <S%H8649><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> and his brothers <S%H251><s%> be come <S%H935><s%> to Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> they fortify <S%H6696><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you.
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore up by night, <S%H3915><s%> you and the people <S%H5971><s%> that is with you, and lie in wait <S%H693><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%>

And it shall be, that in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> as soon as the sun <S%H8121><s%> is up, you shall rise <S%H7925><s%> early, <S%H7925><s%> and set <S%H6584><s%> on the city: <S%H5892><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> when he and the people <S%H5971><s%> that is with him come <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H413><s%> you, then may you do <S%H6213><s%> to them as you shall find <S%H4672><s%> occasion. <S%H4672><s%>

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up, and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him, by night, <S%H3915><s%> and they laid wait <S%H693><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> in four <S%H702><s%> companies. <S%H7218><s%>

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out, and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city: <S%H5892><s%> and Abimelech <S%H40><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up, and the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him, from lying in wait. <S%H3993><s%>

And when Gaal <S%H1603><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to Zebul, <S%H2083><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> there come <S%H3381><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%> And Zebul <S%H2083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, You see <S%H7200><s%> the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> as if they were men. <S%H582><s%>

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> again, <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> See <S%H2009><s%> there come <S%H3381><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> by the middle <S%H2872><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> company <S%H7218><s%> come <S%H935><s%> along by the plain <S%H436><s%> of Meonenim. <S%H6049><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Zebul <S%H2083><s%> to him, Where <S%H346><s%> is now <S%H645><s%> your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> you said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> that we should serve <S%H5647><s%> him? is not this <S%H2088><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that you have despised? <S%H3988><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> out, I pray <S%H4994><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> with them.
And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out before <S%H6440><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> chased <S%H7291><s%> him, and he fled <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, and many <S%H7227><s%> were overthrown <S%H5307><s%> and wounded, <S%H2491><s%> even to the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate. <S%H8179><s%>

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> at Arumah: <S%H725><s%> and Zebul <S%H2083><s%> thrust <S%H1644><s%> out Gaal <S%H1603><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> that they should not dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>
And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on the morrow, <S%H4283><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out into the field; <S%H7704><s%> and they told <S%H5046><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and divided <S%H2673><s%> them into three <S%H7969><s%> companies, <S%H7218><s%> and laid wait <S%H693><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> were come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the city; <S%H5892><s%> and he rose <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> them, and smote <S%H5221><s%> them.

And Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and the company <S%H7218><s%> that was with him, rushed <S%H6584><s%> forward, <S%H6584><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city: <S%H5892><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> other companies <S%H7218><s%> ran <S%H6584><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were in the fields, <S%H7704><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> them.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against the city <S%H5892><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that day; <S%H3117><s%> and he took <S%H3920><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that was therein, and beat <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and sowed <S%H2232><s%> it with salt. <S%H4417><s%>

And when all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that, they entered <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> an hold <S%H6877><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the god <S%H410><s%> Berith. <S%H1286><s%>
And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> were gathered <S%H6908><s%> together.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> got <S%H5927><s%> him up to mount <S%H2022><s%> Zalmon, <S%H6756><s%> he and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him; and Abimelech <S%H40><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> an ax <S%H7134><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and cut <S%H3772><s%> down a bough <S%H7754><s%> from the trees, <S%H6086><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> it, and laid <S%H7760><s%> it on <S%H5921><s%> his shoulder, <S%H7926><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him, What <S%H4100><s%> you have seen <S%H7200><s%> me do, <S%H6213><s%> make haste, <S%H4116><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> as I have done.
